title: Determinants of maize farmers willingness to pay for private extension services in Ejisu municipality, Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): John-Eudes Andivi Bakang, Camillus Abawiera Wongnaa, Enoch Kwame Tham-Agyekum, Suraju Fatimatu, Jonathan Annorhene Obeng, Elsie Boatemah Nsafoah, Michael Asiedu Antwi
